name: Sleeping Dogs: Year of the Snake
name_original: Sleeping Dogs: Year of the Snake
description:
Sleeping Dogs: Year of the Snake is an action-shooter game developed by United Front Games. It came out on 13-03-2013. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Sleeping Dogs: Year of the Snake is available on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC.
